title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.83 - Lubrication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.83 - Lubrication

State Regulations

Bearings and gears requiring lubricants are to be designed and constructed so that the lubricant cannot leak, drip or be forced into the food or onto food-contact surfaces. Food-grade lubricants are to be used on or within food-contact surfaces. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
